channel.title: Into The Depths - Insomniac
channel.description:
I wrote this just after a session with my Dungeons & Dragons group. My friend Connor’s character had just jumped into a 75ft deep puddle of water with no exit but up. He was running from a Dracolich. Keep that in mind as you listen...
https://soundcloud.com/insomniac1006/into-the-depths
Edit: @anon86704580 could you do a rating?
